mapper.update: update monthlystatistics set customerJanuary=customerJanuary+#{customerJanuary}, customerFebruary=customerFebruary+#{customerFebruary}, customerMarch=customerMarch+#{customerMarch}, customerApril=customerApril+#{customerApril}, customerMay=customerMay+#{customerMay}, customerJune=customerJune+#{customerJune}, customerJuly=customerJuly+#{customerJuly}, customerAugust=customerAugust+#{customerAugust}, customerSeptember=customerSeptember+#{customerSeptember}, customerOctober=customerOctober+#{customerOctober}, customerNovember=customerNovember+#{customerNovember}, customerDecember=customerDecember+#{customerDecember}, totalAmount=totalAmount+#{totalAmount}, team=#{team}, orgteam=#{orgteam} where userId=#{userId} and customeryeah=#{customeryeah}
mapper.select: select o.name as orgteam,s.id as userId ,t.name as team from sys_organization o,sys_department t,sys_dept_user d,sys_user s where o.id=t.org_id and t.id=d.dept_id and d.user_id=s.id and s.id not in (select userId from monthlystatistics where customeryeah=#{customeryeah}) group by o.name,s.id,t.name
select REQLMT as totalAmount,LOANDATE as loandate from mibusidata where userid=#{userId}
select customeryeah,team,orgteam from MONTHLYSTATISTICS where userid=#{userId} group by customeryeah,team,orgteam
select * from MONTHLYSTATISTICS t where userid=#{userId} and customeryeah=#{customeryeah}
select sum(totalAmount) from MONTHLYSTATISTICS t where userid=#{userId}

select amp.user_id as userId,su.display_name as name FROM manager_belong_map mbm ,account_manager_parameter amp , sys_user su, ( select id from account_manager_parameter where user_id=#{userId}) cc
WHERE mbm.parent_id =cc.id and amp.id = mbm.child_id and su.id = amp.user_id
select distinct orgteam,team from MONTHLYSTATISTICS order by team,orgteam
select t.name as team from sys_organization o,sys_department t,sys_dept_user d,sys_user s where o.id=t.org_id and t.id=d.dept_id and d.user_id=s.id and s.id=#{userId} group by o.name,s.id,t.name
